name: Sheets button
label: Sheets
tooltip: Force a report to Google Sheets

name: Next watering
func:
msg.payload = (msg.payload.WB2 - msg.payload.DW2).toFixed(2) + " kg";
return msg;

name: Next watering
func:
msg.payload = (msg.payload.WB1 - msg.payload.DW1).toFixed(2) + " kg";
return msg;

name: Waste full in
func:
msg.payload = (msg.payload.WL1 - msg.payload.WR1).toFixed(2) + " kg";
return msg;

name: HTML email template
Format Alerts
Count Array size / Set email title
func:
msg.topic = "GrowBox report"; //Email title
flow.set("SendEmail",false); //Reset email sending flag
msg.ActiveAlertsSize = flow.get('ActiveAlerts').length;  //Count active alerts array size
msg.RecoveredAlertsSize = flow.get('RecoveredAlerts').length; //Count resolved alerts array size



return msg;
